Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne balia bayingananga khu Nyasaye nibamalile okhufuchililwa, okhuyingana khwabu nokhukhaya imbeli wa Nyasaye wabu Omulesi, ne basinyishilwa ne bali nende eshinyasio eshilulu
Nyasaye niye weshia eshitabu khubwatoto nende eshichelo, ne ni shina shiokhumanyia mbu indukho ili ahambi
Abalasuubila bayungubasinjia benya mbu yitse lwangu, ne abasuubili bayiria ne bamanya mbu toto niyahabwene, koo manya mbu, balia bayingana inyanga ye indukho eyo, bali mubukori abwa ehale muno
Nyasaye nomwihotselefu khubasumba bebe, akabanga omukabo owayenya, naye niye Owamani Owoluyali muno
Yesi yesi wenya lichesa lwomwikulu khulamumetela khwo, ne ulia wenya lichesa liokhushialo khulamuhelesia, ne abula shiosi shiosi mwikulu

Nohomba bo bali nende abanyasaye babatsokaasinjia, babakaasilia amalako keyidini ya Nyasaye alabafuchilila tawe, ne likhayanga okhuba likhuwa liokhwaukhasia bakhakhalachilwe, ne toto ababii bali nende eshinyasio eshilulu

Olilola aboononi nibali abari khukabakhola, nako kaliboolela butswa, nebalia basuubila mana nibakhola amalayi baliba mumikunda chio mwikulu, baliba nende shiabenya shiosi shiosi imbeli wa Nyasaye wabu Omulesi, okho nikhwo okhubura okhukhongo
